faqs.question: Are you guys a cafe?
faqs.answer: Nope. But we help cafes connect to people by curating a list of cafes around Malaysia! Use our maps to find a cafe with nice people hopefully. With enough interest, maybe one day, we will have a cafe to screen films, have photo exhibitions, run our own tech company, serve fine teas and coffee and have a design studio in it. *sigh*

faqs.question: Are you guys like an organisation of hipster cafes?
faqs.answer: Um, we’re not. Cafe Hop is a project registered under Mindful Wanderers LLP (LLP0002651-LGN). There is an association for Malaysia Speciality Coffee but if there is help you need with, you can always drop us a line at cafehopkl [at] gmail.com.

faqs.question: How do you guys pick cafes into the map?
faqs.answer: In our spare time, we check some places out and decide based on good ambience, good food, good coffee and/or good service. We have a weak spot for independent run (read: not a chain/franchise/licencee) and local do-good cafes.

faqs.question: I own a cafe. Pick me! How do I get into your map?
faqs.answer: We will find you or you can try your luck and drop us an email at cafehopkl [at] gmail.com. We try to be anonymous about our visits and don’t expect to be treated any special. We just want more choice of good coffee/food/ambience/service for everyone. :)

faqs.question: How often do you update your map?
faqs.answer: As often as the full moon rises or whenever we can get down to it.

faqs.question: How do you guys make money?
faqs.answer: We convert caffeine into ideas and from these ideas come money. Hopefully. Soon. Any time now, please.

faqs.question: Do you guys do coffee pop-ups, coffee catering, coffee sharing and appreciation classes?
faqs.answer: No but our sister project : Spacebar Coffee might. Look us up at spacebarcoffee.wordpress.com.
